goals.title: Marketplace
subgoals: Developers earn tokens by licensing their modules
Users reuse existing modules to create applications

goals.title: Release of MESG Token
subgoals: Created as an ERC20 on Ethereum Mainnet
Enables access to the modules of the Marketplace

goals.title: Test Net
subgoals: Modules are executed directly on the decentralized network
Users don't need to run modules on their own computers

goals.title: Public Network
subgoals: Launch of the full MESG Token economy
Self-regulating ecosystem consistently increasing the value of the MESG Token
ERC20 tokens converted to MESG Tokens
